msbt.message: Hi! I just moved here today. I heard you just moved in too! You're , right? Well, I'm . Nice to meet you, !

Hey! I'm ! You just moved here today, right? Ohmigosh, I heard about you!You're ! You're almost as famous on this island as I'm going to be WORLDWIDE!See, I've got plans to be a pop star, so now's def the time to talk to me about getting involved in my career.I'm going to need someone to design costumes, to run my fan club, to remember my food allergies for meMost of them are boiled vegetables. I trust you to find out which ones.Great meeting you! Let's hang out soon soon sooooooon!

Hi! You're , right?<10_4 /> I'm ! How's stuff?You moving in is all anybody's talking about. But I've met you, which means I'm ahead of the curve, like always!Let's hang later! I've got music to play for you, opinions to share, and video games to co-op, !

Ohmigosh, it's ! Welcome to the island!You are all ANYONE can talk about today! You're like a mini-celebrity! A fun-size superstar!You have GOT to give me pointers for life in the spotlight. See, I'm going to be super famous too! Really soon!I'm entered into a TON of pop-star- of-tomorrow contests. I dance, I sing, I play LOTS of instrumentsI know the tambourine, the recorder, the big drum with the foot thing OH! And three notes on saxophone!Ohmigosh! I feel like I'm bragging!<10_4 /> Well, welcome to the island. Once you're settled in, let's hang out!

Ohhhhi. Did you just move to ? Nice to meet<10_10 />—CHOO!<10_9 />Sorry, I'm stupid sick right now Bleh! So much gloop, so few tissues.You're , right? I'm .Let's hang out when I've got less nose gu-uh-uhhh<10_10 />CHOO!<10_9 />

Hi! You from around here? I just moved to the island!I'm . And I'm totes not used to rando folks just, you know, walking into my house.Oh, you're ? What a fab name. Nice to meet you, . This place is a train wreck right now, but when I'm done, it'll be so adorbs you'll faint!So be ready for that. Maybe bring a pillow or something to land on. Laters, !

Hi! I just moved here! My name's ! You're , right?Hey, I'm deep in the middle of unpacking, but when I'm done, you should totes come over! Ohmigosh! You're going to freak out about how adorbs my place is once it's fully finished, !

Ohmigosh, it's so nice to meet you! I'm , by the way.I'm about to be a world-famous pop star, so my plan is to get on-brand here on Then take on the world!<10_4 /> Get on these coattails now if you want in on my entourage, !

I haven't seen you around before, have I? I'm ! I moved in, like, JUST the other day.This island is SO NICE! The smell great, the folks are great, the beaches are SO close to the oceanWe have to hang out sometime so we can talk even more about how much I love it here!

You're, right? I've heard about you, but I'm glad I can finally see your face! My name's and I moved here about a week ago.Weird how it took so long to meet Probs should've paused my non- stop dance practice long enough to<10_10 />OHMIGOSH! I TOTALLY FORGOT ABOUT DANCE PRACTICE!<10_9 />Well, it's nice to meet you finally! Let's hang out sometime when I don't have practice!

<10_10 />AAAHH-CHOOOOO!<10_9 />Oh. Hi. I haven't met youhave I? I'm .<10_10 />AHHHHH-<10_5 />CHOOOOOOOO!<10_9 />Sorry. I got a coldor a fluor the grodies? I'm no doctor, but there's a LOT of gross stuff happening today.Anyway, you're ? It's been nice meeting you, but I have got to go get some rest.
Hi! said this was a pretty fab island for an aspiring pop star to live on. So here I am!You're , right? Ohmigosh, said you're great peeps!We MUST hang out sometime, OK? I want the whole guided tour!

Ohmigosh! It's so nice to meet you! I'm ! I used to live over on but invited me to move here! Said it was THE place to be for an aspiring pop star like me!Anyhoo, I've heard ALL about you, ! So we def need to hang out sometime!

Hi! You're , right? I'm !I used to live on , but convinced me to move here! said this island is THE place to be right now as an up-and-coming aspiring pop star.And it's totes true! Since I moved here, I've been thinking about being a pop star MORE THAN EVER!

Hi! I'm ! I just moved here from ! told me this island was, you know, awesome. So I said to myself"" That's me, in case you forgot already. "Maybe you should move to that awesome place."And I was all, "Yeah! Maybe I will. Because I hear it is awesome."<10_4 /> So here I am, !Pretty fab story, huh? Well, I need to boogie, soooocatch you later, !

Huh? <10_10 />AH-<10_5 />CHOO!<10_9 />I am so sick right now Wait a sec. I'm, like, dizzy from sneezing<10_4 /> Have we met?I'm . I got invited to move here by .We should hang out sometime. When I'm not—<10_10 />AH-CHOO!<10_9 /> Yeah. That. See you later I hope

Hi! I'm . I moved here aaaaall the way from sunny and sassy !Want to hear something messed up? Of course you do. I knew somebody who lived on this island.They were all, "You gotta move here! It's awesome!" So I moved and they're gone!No note, no forwarding address, no nothing! Which is TOTES lame!Ah well, . It all worked out in the end. I'm here now, and we can hang out all the time!

Hey! We haven't metright? I just moved here the other day. I'm ! I lived over on , and somebody I knew on this island said I'd love it here. Buuuuutthey bailed before I moved here! Ugh. I was so excited to hang out with them again. Look, I know we just metbut I'm going to be the best friend you've ever had, .<10_4 /> The. Best.

Um. Hihave we met? I'm .Ugh. I feel soooo gross right now <10_10 />AH-CHOO!<10_9 /> Bleh.I met someone from here who invited me to move. I thought, "Fun! I'll go hang with them on their island"But THEY don't live here anymore. Who does that? Who invites someone over, then bails?We should hang out someti-ah-ah-<10_10 />ACHOOOOOIE!<10_9 />Once I quit sneezing on everyone
Hi! I'm !I moved from , but guess what? I used to live on this island! I left, but now I'm BACK!And of course I know who you are! You're nearly a legend around here, !

You're , right? It's great to meet you! I'm .I moved here all the way over from , but that's not even the interesting part.I totally USED TO LIVE HERE! On this island! Totally for realsies! Isn't that WILD?!But that was a couple of forevers ago, so this island legit feels brand-new to me now.

Oh, hi. I'm . Nice to meet you. I just moved here from .<10_10 />AH-CHOO!<10_4 /> <10_9 />Sorry. I'm kind of sick right now.Want to hear something funny? I used to live on this island, but decided to come back.Then as soon as I get here, I get sick. BLEGH Still, good to meet you, .Let's hang outif I ever feel better.

Oh, are you from here? I just moved here today! I'm . Ohmigosh! It's great to meet you!Yeah, I moved all the way over from ! It's so nice here! <10_4 />Not as many monsters, for sure. Well, hey, I need to clean up the mess I made moving in, but I hope we can hang out soon, !
Hi, ! I'm !I just moved here from good old because I heard this island was totes bonkers!AND. IT. IS! It's so fun here and I am SO glad I moved! Let's hang out really soon, !
Hi, you're , right? I'm , and I moved over from ! This is SUCH a trendy island! I'm so excited to live here, I could pop! Ew! That'd be messy, !

Heeeey, I'm ! I lived on , and that was cool and allBut I need a T-E-N! That's "Trendy, Exciting, and New"! Someplace like , ! You're , right? You have got to show me around this top T-E-N island we live on!

Hi. I'm . N-ni-nice to me-meet yooo—<10_10 />ACH-OOOO!<10_9 />Sorry, I'm kind of sick right now I caught a cold moving here from . Le ugh.Maybe come back when I'm feeling better? I'd love to hang out.

Ohmigosh! Hi! My name's , and I just moved here today! <10_9 />I met and they said I'd like living on this island So, I don't know, it sounded fun!You ever move halfway across the world just because it sounds fun? Well, it is fun!
Hi! Nice to meet you! I'm ! invited me to move to , and I couldn't resist! It's so nice here! ! I can't wait to get to know you. We're going to be the BEST of friends, !

Hey! Nice to meet you! I'm ! gave me the tip to move here. And let me tell you knows what is UP! This island is très amazè! Every day is a new adventure! , it's so cool to meet you. We are going to have SO much fun, !

Ohmigosh, , it is, like, so nice to meet you! I'm ! told me all about how le fab this island is, so I decided to move here!And it's true! This place is the best! I'm dying to learn all about you and , !

<10_10 />AH-<10_5 />CHOO!<10_9 />I am so sick right now Wait a sec. I'm, like, dizzy from sneezing<10_4 /> Have we met?I'm . I got invited to move here by .I've loved it here so far, but then I got sick. You're ? Cool. I've heard about you.We should hang out sometime. When I'm not—<10_10 />AH-CHOO!<10_9 />— sneezing on everything.

Hi! I'm .Want to hear something messed up? Of course you do. I knew somebody who lived on this island.They were all, "Move here! It's awesome!" And it IS awesome! Butthey're not here!I don't know if they got lost, or if aliens grabbed them, or maybe they were a ghost all along!Whatever it was, , I'm glad you and me can hang out!

Hey! We haven't metright? I just moved here the other day. I'm ! The goof who invited me to come live here has totes ghosted on me. What nerve, right?At least I got to meet a new neighbor today! We should hang out and you can show me around the island!

Heyhave we met? I'm .Ugh. I feel soooo lame right now <10_10 />AH-CHOO!<10_9 /> Grossnose gunk. Bleh.I got an invite to move here, and I thought, "Hey! Fun!" But the person who invited me has bailed! You're , right? We need to hang out somet-ah-ah-<10_10 />ACHOOOOOIE!<10_9 />I should go lie down

Hi! I'm ! I just moved here today, and I've GOT to sayit seems WAY cool so far!I was glamping here— I call camping glamping. It's "glam" for "glamour" mixed with "ping" for "camping"<10_10 />Glamping!<10_9 />Anyhoo I met who did the hard sell to get me to move here So here I am!You're , right? Ohmigosh, said you're really good peeps!We need to hang out sometime, OK? I want the whole guided tour!

Ohmigosh! It's so nice to meet you! I'm ! I was here camping for only one daybut invited me to move here! Said it was THE place to be for an aspiring pop star like me!Anyhoo, I've heard ALL about you, ! So we def need to hang out sometime!
Hi! You're , right? I'm !I was here camping for only one day, but convinced me to move here full-time! said this island is the très IN place to live right now. How could I NOT move?!

Hi! I'm ! I just moved here! told me this island was, you know, awesome.So I figured, why just camp for one day when I could live here forever?<10_4 /> So here I am, !Pretty fab story, huh? Well, I need to head out, soooocatch you later, !

Huh? <10_10 />AH-<10_5 />CHOO!<10_9 />I'm so sick right nowhave we met?I'm . I got invited to move here by .I was here camping and loved the vibe, so I movedbut then I got sick.You're , right? Let's hang out when I'm not—<10_10 /> AH-CHOO!<10_9 /> When I'm not doing that

Hi! I'm .I used to know somebody who lived on this island. I met them while I was camping here.I got this whole sales pitch, right? "Move here! It's cool!" So I did And now they're gone!What a lame thing to do. <10_4 />Ah well, just means I have more time to hang with fab folks like you!
Hey! We haven't metright? I just moved here the other day. I'm ! I know we JUST metbut I see no reason we can't be the best BFFs ever in history. Sound good? Good.

Heyhave we met? I'm .Ugh. I feel soooo bad right now <10_10 />AH-CHOO!<10_9 /> Grossnose gunk. Bleh.I was here camping when I was invited to move here. I figured it'd be fun.But the rando who invited me doesn't live here anymore!Who does that? Who invites someone over, then bails?You're , right? We need to hang out somet-ah-ah-<10_10 />ACHOOOOOIE!<10_9 />Once I quit sneezing on everyone

Hi! It's way nice to meet you! I'm ! invited me to move here when I was visiting the campsite, so I did it! I moved!Ohmigosh. I still have unpacking to do, so I can't hang out yet. But soon, my newest bestie, we will have fun!

Ohmigosh! It is très excellentè to meet you! I'm !While I was hanging out at the campsite, invited me to glam this island up full-timeSo I'm going to glamify, trendify, fashify—and a bunch of other words I'm inventing—this whole island!

Ohmigosh! Have you ever seen me before? Ha! Of course you haven't! I'm ! ? Wow, that's like the name of a rock star! SOLID like a rock, GLOWING like a star Anyhoo, I was camping on this island when invited me to move here.Now that I'm here, I want to get to know everyone and be best friends with all of you, !
We haven't met before, right? Nice to meet you! I'm !I was here on a camping trip when did the invite thing and asked me to stick around!I'm so excited to get to know everybody, !

Hey Ugh. This is the worst Do I know you? Is the cold making me see things? I'm .I met at the campsite and we decided it'd be way fun if I moved here.But now I have a cold and I'm trapped at home! If I ever get better, we'll have to hang out, .

Ohmigosh! It's a new face! Hi! I'm !I was at the campsite when some rando resident said I should move herebut I guess they moved away. Whatever! I can make plenty of new friends! I've already forgotten that rando's name anyway, !

Hi! Nice to meet you! I'm !I was doing the "living outdoors" thing at the campsite when someone invited me to move hereI should have learned their name, because they're not here anymore, and I'd like to complain about that Whatever! They bolted, but you're here. And I'd WAY rather hang with someone who's here, !

Hey, welcome to my house! I'm ! Oh! Pardon me.I was camping on the island— Pardon me! And got invited to stick around— Excuse me! I think I'm getting a cold. Listen, once I'm better— Excuse me. We need to hang out, .<10_4 /> Gah. Pardon me!
